sub_topic: Probability of a certain outcome in a sports game
message_1: In a soccer game between teams A and B, the probability of team A winning is 0.6. What is the probability that team A does not win the game?
message_2:
The probability of an event not happening is equal to 1 minus the probability of the event happening. In this case, the probability of team A not winning the game is:

1 - P(Team A wins) = 1 - 0.6 = 0.4

So, the probability that team A does not win the game is 0.4 or 40%.
